name: Ext_R5_PackagedProductDefinition_packaging
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PackagedProductDefinition.packaging for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents PackagedProductDefinition.packaging from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A packaging item, as a container for medically related items, possibly with other packaging items within, or a packaging component, such as bottle cap
element.definition: A packaging item, as a container for medically related items, possibly with other packaging items within, or a packaging component, such as bottle cap (which is not a device or a medication manufactured item).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: An identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging. Including possibly a Data Carrier Identifier
element.definition: A business identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging, often assigned by the manufacturer. Including possibly Data Carrier Identifier (a GS1 barcode).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: An identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging. Including possibly a Data Carrier Identifier
element.definition: A business identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging, often assigned by the manufacturer. Including possibly Data Carrier Identifier (a GS1 barcode).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The physical type of the container of the items
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The physical type of the container of the items
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

binding.description: A high level categorisation of a package.

element.short: Is this a part of the packaging (e.g. a cap or bottle stopper), rather than the packaging itself (e.g. a bottle or vial)
element.definition: Is this a part of the packaging (e.g. a cap or bottle stopper), rather than the packaging itself (e.g. a bottle or vial). The latter type are designed be a container, but the former are not.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Is this a part of the packaging (e.g. a cap or bottle stopper), rather than the packaging itself (e.g. a bottle or vial)
element.definition: Is this a part of the packaging (e.g. a cap or bottle stopper), rather than the packaging itself (e.g. a bottle or vial). The latter type are designed be a container, but the former are not.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The quantity of this level of packaging in the package that contains it (with the outermost level being 1)
element.definition: The quantity of packaging items contained at this layer of the package. This does not relate to the number of contained items but relates solely to the number of packaging items. When looking at the outermost layer it is always 1. If there are two boxes within, at the next layer it would be 2.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The quantity of this level of packaging in the package that contains it (with the outermost level being 1)
element.definition: The quantity of packaging items contained at this layer of the package. This does not relate to the number of contained items but relates solely to the number of packaging items. When looking at the outermost layer it is always 1. If there are two boxes within, at the next layer it would be 2.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Material type of the package item
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Material type of the package item
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

binding.description: A material used in the construction of packages and their components.

element.short: A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material
element.definition: A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material (e.g. different types of plastic for a blister sleeve).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material
element.definition: A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material (e.g. different types of plastic for a blister sleeve).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

binding.description: A material used in the construction of packages and their components.

element.short: Shelf Life and storage information
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Data type name for PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.shelfLifeStorage from FHIR R5
element.definition: Data type name for PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.shelfLifeStorage from FHIR R5

element.short: Manufacturer of this packaging item (multiple means these are all potential manufacturers)
element.definition: Manufacturer of this packaging item. When there are multiple values each one is a potential manufacturer of this packaging item.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Manufacturer of this packaging item (multiple means these are all potential manufacturers)
element.definition: Manufacturer of this packaging item. When there are multiple values each one is a potential manufacturer of this packaging item.
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

binding.description: This value set includes all observable entity codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

element.short: A value for the characteristic
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: A value for the characteristic
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The item(s) within the packaging
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device, or other medically related item (food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package
element.definition: The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device (typically, but not necessarily, a co-packaged one), or other medically related item (such as food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package. This also allows another whole packaged product to be included, which is solely for the case where a package of other entire packages is wanted - such as a wholesale or distribution pack (for layers within one package, use PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.packaging).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device, or other medically related item (food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package
element.definition: The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device (typically, but not necessarily, a co-packaged one), or other medically related item (such as food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package. This also allows another whole packaged product to be included, which is solely for the case where a package of other entire packages is wanted - such as a wholesale or distribution pack (for layers within one package, use PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.packaging).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The number of this type of item within this packaging or for continuous items such as liquids it is the quantity (for example 25ml). See also PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity (especially the long definition)
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: The number of this type of item within this packaging or for continuous items such as liquids it is the quantity (for example 25ml). See also PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity (especially the long definition)
element.definition: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.short: Allows containers (and parts of containers) within containers, still as a part of single packaged product
element.definition: Allows containers (and parts of containers) within containers, still as a part of a single packaged product. See also PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.containedItem.item(PackagedProductDefinition).
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.packaging` has no related element in R4B:PackagedProductDefinition

element.definition: Data type name for PackagedProductDefinition.packaging.packaging from FHIR R5
